snippet: E*Trade Financial on Thursday named Paul T. Idzik, a former executive at Barclays, as its new chief, ending a five-month search for a new leader.
abstract: E*Trade Financial on Thursday named Paul T. Idzik, a former executive at Barclays, as its new chief, ending a five-month search for a new leader.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: E*Trade Names Former Barclays Executive as New Chief
